page.title: 15WALREDDON MANOR
page.content: {Walreddon Manor }was built in the reign of {Edward VI}1547-1553 by the { {Courtenay }family.It has 17 rooms which have been restored by the{ {Hudsons }who have been living there for 9 months but have owned it for 3 years. The most famous person to live in the house was{Lady Mary Howard}who was married 3 times before she was 17. There is a legend that she haunts the manor house but the story may be about another house in Tavistock. There are 200 acres of farm land and 150 acres of common land. {Mr.Hugh Hudson}is a film director he has directed {Greystoke,Chariots Of {Fire }and{Revolution. Mrs Hudson helps with the art at our school,their son Thomas comes to our school in the lnfants.
